Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: RESULTS : While the CAN and PD groups tended to record greater deficits than the non - drug controls , the MDMA and EX - MDMA groups recorded greater deficits than all the control groups on ten of the 13 psychometric measures .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| PD (Parkinson's Disease) |
| CAN (Cannabis Anxiety or Cannabis Neurosis) |
| MDMA (Methylenedioxymethamphetamine or Ecstasy) use |
| EX-MDMA (Previous MDMA or Ecstasy use) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| PD (Parkinson's Disease) |
| CAN (Cannabis Anxiety or Cannabis Neurosis) |

The term "MDMA and EX-MDMA groups" does not clearly refer to diseases, but rather to groups of individuals who have used MDMA (Methylenedioxymethamphetamine or Ecstasy) or have previously used MDMA. Therefore, they are not considered diseases in this context.
